document_data.name: Tower of the Talon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the Talon''' was a fortress inhabited by a cell of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] ''circa'' [[1479 DR]]. It was named in honor of [[Anabraxis]] the Black Talon. The tower was shaped to look like a huge [[dragon]] fang with two tips. There were numerous balconies in the tower for the convenience of dragons. The tower was organized as a military organization and had a large armory and barracks.
